data.name: LOUD
data.detailed_description:
Strike those chords, catch the spotlight, scream from the top of your lungs, it's time to ROCK!


LOUD is one girl's journey towards her dreams of rock stardom told through an arcade music game that's simple to pick up and so satisfying you'll never want to put it down. Astrid, a reclusive aspiring musician, didn't even dare to follow her dreams. But there's some magical in taking a real guitar in your hands for the first time. Even a shy, quiet girl can find her voice and discover that it is LOUD, if the Gods of Rock decide she's destined for the stage!

FEATURES:

  • 12 diverse levels, each featuring an original song (+ tutorial track & bonus track!)
  • Simple, arcade controls delivering a satisfying and challenging gameplay experience
  • Three classic difficulty levels plus unlockable extreme difficulty
  • Outfits, guitars, and locations change as your journey to rock stardom progresses
  • Makes you feel like a rockstar when you land a perfect solo!

data.short_description: A wholesome, music-filled arcade rhythm game in which a young, reclusive rocker goes on a journey of self-discovery. Once she begins to follow her dreams and finds her inner voice, she discovers that it is LOUD!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th gen or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780M or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
